text: “ hari misis lorans..
thun parak kiyewuwahamayi therune.

me dushkara gamana pilibandawa lipiya aarambhaye liyana lesa mama ranjithta upades dunimi.raththaran helena samanga janapriya wu rohana baddage soya api horanata giyemu.ma gamata gos sitina awasthawakadi wijitha mallika awissawellata nuduru dehigahapitiye innawa yayi mata aaranchiyak labini.
karanna puluwan windithayanta saha pawule samajikayanta.
kohoma hari ape ayage wada kiyanne, oya aadayam badu departhamenthuwa repayar kalata, eeta eha paththe thiyena pipals bank eka gana poddak wath hoyala baluwe na.
anuradhapuraye sirima bo samindun wethin thawath ankura this dekak hatagena eyin dethis pala bodhin wahanse bihi wuni.
mata eka dawasak rohalakadi mehe satanakin pahara wadila pita konda pana nathuwa giyapu sebalakewa hamu wuna.
ee nisa mama barsa wetha pamina ehi wada katayuthu dakimi.
meken ekek yawwa wadiya dangaluwoth meken kanna thamayi wenne’ kiya pistholayak pennuwa.
nawatha hamuwennam mama hondin, obata?

mulinma mulika ayithiwasikam ullanghanaya kirimata adala pethsam elesa gonu kirimata pahasukam salasana bawath labana marthu masaye sita eya kriyathmaka kirimata apeksha karana bawath me sambandhayen karunu pahadili karamin shreshtadhikaranaye rejistrar maheshi jayasekara mahathmiya eeye 'diwayina'ta pawasuwaya.

siyalu sanskarayo anithyayi kiyala thama budu baneth kiyala thiyenne…
naththan balanne kare urema naginta.
awuruddak withara nethali kelin kondeth ekka jiwath wuna.amuthuwen hada gaththa konde arunama aluthen ena konde nethali kiyuwe de ahuwe naha.
eya sisil nowe.
namuth, rata thula hadisi thaththwayak prakashayata path kara athi heyin wirodhatha pawathwiya nohaki bawa polisiya owunta danum dunne ya.
oba wisin budu dahama ho buddha shasanaya ho rakagatha yuththe ayi kiyala?
kalaya dina sathi gewi gos ek dinayaka, "nanga, prashnayak ahanna awankawama uththara denawada?"
habayi gahannama oone gem ekak.
balanna oya issara kochchara daksha da?
gandath barinam umbaa kohomada eeka thiyenawa kiyanne?"
“aawa ithin ara kella para danna nisa..
itha kuda me step motar kotas thamange karmanthashalawedi ekalas kirimata awasi yanthrea්pakarana lahi lahiye tayitan thula nishpadanaya kerini.

thamage yahapathata thawath sathekuge jiwithayak mese winasha kirima niwaradida?.. hindu dahama pradhana aagama wu indiyaweda mewani mithyadrushtika bilipuja thahanam kara athath, dharmadwipaya wu me lak bime mema thathwaya itha hodin keri yana bawa oba wahanselata penenawa atha.
ee wagema lanwima 2015 di laba karala dunne nadda?
ee nisa apen gena yana badu bedaharima tikak mandagami wela thiyenawa.
karmikaranaya sandaha awashya balashakthiyath amudrawyayath me rate natha.
'yannam ralahami' kiyala ralahamita kiyak hari dunna nam iwarane.
niyama sinhaya kisiwakutath biyak aththeth nathiya.

math issara godak kiyewwa.

thatitu 25ka mahal niwasa usa) uparima ෙwigaya pa:sa: 30
wedin eka dawase biththiwalata kotu wela inna apita oona wune naha.
hruda roga awama karagatha haki meda sanghataka ata warga thula anthargathawa atha.
oya paththakin thiyena lebal tika baluwanan ee wage thereyi..
de jan gum namathi rupawahini kathamalawa thula koriyawe siti dushtama raju lesa ohuwa dakwa atha.
100% bhawitha kirimata aarakshitha
kese ho ohu menma ohu jiwath wi athi parisaraya gana da mata aththe dadi lobakamaki.
ee anshayen idiriyata yanna thama balaporoththu wenne.
thamange adarayayi ee aadarayata udawu karapu umangayi ithuru karala metland aandukarawaraya thamange mawu ratata yanawa.
ranilge 'wagabadu aramudalath' hindila - namalgen helidarawwak -
elesa wadiwu naya pramanayen salakiya yuthu kotasak waya wi thibune yuddhaya sarthakawa nima kirimataya.
jiniwa: siduwiya hakke kumakda?
kahatagasdigiliye wattakka nugegoda sathosata enne kohoma da?
oya inne podi kalema indan duma adapu kattiya!
chat karanna giyath, munu pothe masej ekak baluwath ,kathawa gana ahala thibbanam kawuruth ahala thibunu podu prashnayak wune "meka aththama kathawak neda?"
ekata mama ebuna..
maknisada yath ehi balapawathwenne aagamika muladharma wana bawini.

ee sama­ngama jana­dhi­pathi gota­bhaya raja­paksha maha­thage upa­des paridi rata­pura ali minis gatum athi prade­sha­wala ali widuli wata kilo­mi­tar 5000k alu­thama idi kiri­ma­tath eewa raka bala­ga­ni­ma­tath siwil aara­ksha­ka­yan 2000k ha gamwala jiwa­thwena pari­sa­ra­yata hithathi tharu­na­yan 1000k sahitha bala­ka­yak pihi­tu­wana bawath ama­thi­wa­raya kiya.

api, kridikawan, dan yanthamin hisa osowala balanawa."daruwo waradi karanawa."

krikat kridakayange padaye aabadha walakwimata nawa wyapruthiyak shri lanka krikat kridakayange padaye aashritha aabadha walakwimata wishesha wyapruthiyak diyath kirimata shri lanka krikat aayathanaya katayuthu yoda thibe.pasugiya kalaya pura kridakayange athiwu aabadha salaka balimen pasu padaye saha walalukara pilibanda wisheshagnyayaku wana nikalas speranjar mahathage sahaya laba ganimata thiranaya kara thibe.me anuwa mita pera ek wathawak shri lankawata pamini nikalas speranjar mahatha krikat kridakayan samaga sakachchakota padawala hadaya anuwa pawahan nirmanaya kirimata salasum kara thibe.
wenada poshanaya pinisama awakashaya haraha uragath pala wala rasaya windinna, eewaye rasa wenasa wataha ganna, aluth rasayan handuna ganna alutha upan aashwadayakin ma pirila giya.
athithaye sita maha sangharathnaya parithyagashili katayuthu karamin me darshanaya bauddhayinge le mas, ata naharawalata kawadda athi bawada “ ee mahatha kiya.

ho wisthara labadimata pera, ema sankalpaya kalulalle ho projektaraye pradarshanaya kota, ee sandaha antharjalaye athi arthadakwim ha wisthara soyana lesa sisunata anakaranawa.
api mewana wita apita thibuna chanda laksha 15 chunda laksha 20ta genath thibenawa.

ohuta amaru kala thibuna, namuth, heyi,ohu ohuge lamayinta aadareyi.

nawa puhunukaru lesa hemantha dewapriya mahatha saha kantha pile nawa nayikawa lesa inoka ranawira path karamin hitapu puhunukaru lanka da silwa saha hitapu nayika chamari athapaththu ema thanathuruwalin iwath kirima pilibanda adahas dakwamin aashli da silwa mahatha ese kiwe shri lanka – engalantha ekdina tharagawaliya sambandhawa eeye paswaruwe kolambaa jayik hiltan hotalaye pawathi madhya hamuwediya.
uthsahaya sarthaka wewa kiyala prarthana karanawa.
gaman gath thriroda rathaya lori rathayaka gatunu ayuru ema dariya pahadiliwama chithrayata nanga penwuwaya.
hetadina thakshanika aayathanaya obata surya shakthiya balashakthiya bawata path kala haki kramayak hadunwa denne itha sathutini.yugaye awashyathawayak wana meya obata niwasedima ...
ee ayida kiyala mama danne naha.
eheth eyata palamuwa kalama suthraya gana kiwa yuththe thamata ee suthraya no theri athi bawata ma sakshi idiripath kara nathayi amarathunga mahatha pawasana bawini.
me post eka adhirajya wirodhinta, tayi wirodhinta ho danata kisima aabadayak nathuwa tayi eka gatagasaganimata danna buwalata nowe.
‘aya mata wenas jathiyaka wenas rataka kenek kiyala hithune naha.
ee paminille nithignyawarayage haras prashnayanta pilithuru demin ohu thaman sathuwa ewani lekhanayak athayi nila washayen adhikaranaya hamuwe piliganimen anathuruwa ya.
ee samanga saudi rajayen da wimasiya yuththe shri lankawe rajya nayakaya ge illimata wath kan no dimata tharam owun sahasika wuye man da yanna gana ya.
oya yanthra manthra widyawedi.
sampradayika mahajana matha wimasumwala ekathuwata wada owunge asthamenthu wadath niwaradi ya.

anawabodhaye saha dweshaye mema apurwa mishranaya asamanya wuwak nowe.mewani udaharana gananawak pakshaye prakashakaya wana gudsa usendi dani.ohuge kuda pariganakaya saha empi 3 dhawakaya madhya niwedana,prathikshepa kirime niwedana,niwaradi kirime niwedana,paksha sahithyaya,miya giyawunge layisthu,rupawahini darshana ha wenath shrawya drushya upanga walin piri pawathi."gudsa usendi wime narakama hariya" ohu kiyayi."narakama hariya thamayi kawadawath pala nowena niwaradi kirime niwedana yawana eka.apa gana kiyana boru pilibada pahadili karana ewani pala nowu niwedana sahitha wenama pothak wunath hadanna ahaki"ohuge katahada thula kanagatuwak ho kalakirimak natha.thibenuye mada hasyayaki.
